channel.title: Eric Carle on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Eric Carle on jverkamp.com

item.title: Eric Carle's Animals Animals
item.description: That’s an adorable and longer than expected book of poetry about animals in various ways and forms in prime Eric Carle form. I don’t think I’ve met a book of theirs yet I don’t like and this is no exception. Worth the read.
